item.title: U.S. Stock Ethereum Reserve Concept Stocks Experience Collective Pullback, BMNR and GAME Drop Over 10%
item.description: On July 29th, based on the market data from RockFlow, the concept stocks related to Ethereum reserves in the US stock market all saw a pullback. Bitmine Immersion (BMNR) and GameSquare (GAME) decreased by more than 10%, SharpLink Gaming (SBET) and Bit Digital (BTBT) dropped by more than 7%, and BTCS Inc (BTCS) declined by nearly 4%.

item.title: Ethereum PoS Network Exit and Entrance Queue Sees Slight Increase, with ~$25.7 Billion ETH Queued for Exit
item.description: July 29th. Based on the data from the Validator Queue tracking website ValidatorQueue, the current exit queue of the Ethereum PoS network is temporarily reported to be 676,000 ETH, with a recent peak of 744,000 ETH. On July 16th, this number was only 1,920 ETH, and on July 15th, there was no need to queue for exit. Calculated at the current price, approximately $25.7 billion worth of ETH is exiting the PoS network, and the withdrawal delay has extended to 11 days and 18 hours.At the same time, the staking demand for new validator activations has witnessed a turning point after a recent surge. On July 17th, there were 435,000 ETH queued to enter the network, but today, the admission queue has dropped to 245,000 ETH, worth about $9.3 billion, with a current queue time of 4 days and 6 hours.Andy Cronk, the Co-founder of the staking service provider Figment, previously stated: "People unstake and sell to lock in profits when the price rises, and both retail and institutional participan

item.title: Bitget has launched the U-based TREE perpetual contract, with leverage ranging from 1 to 75x.
item.description: On July 29th, as per an official announcement, Bitget has declared the listing of the U-index TREE perpetual contract. The leverage offered ranges from 1 to 75x. Additionally, the contract trading BOT will be launched simultaneously.

item.title: Community Announcement: Hyperliquid Order System Experiencing Malfunction
item.description: July 29th. Based on community feedback, the order matching system of the decentralized derivatives exchange Hyperliquid is currently malfunctioning, preventing users from placing orders.

item.title: The U.S. publicly traded company 180 Life plans to raise approximately $425 million to transform into an Ethereum Treasury Reserve Company.
item.description: On July 29th, as per PR Newswire, the publicly traded U.S. company 180 Life Sciences Corp. (Nasdaq: ATNF) declared its transformation into an Ethereum treasury reserve company. The company intends to raise approximately $425 million through private equity financing. After the completion of the transaction, it plans to rebrand as ETHZilla Corporation.The private equity financing investors encompass Harbour Island, Electric Capital, Polychain Capital, GSR, Omicron Technologies, and others.

item.title: TREE saw a spike at the Binance spot market open, reaching $1.50, and is currently trading at $0.91.
item.description: On July 29th, based on market data, Treehouse (TREE) experienced a significant increase at the opening of Binance's spot market and reached $1.50. Currently, it is trading at $0.91, with a market capitalization of $173 million.

item.title: Analysis: Pump.fun's planned increase in token buyback ratio has not been confirmed yet, and the community should remain cautious
item.description: On July 29th, Dumpster DAO released an analysis on the "market rumor that Pump.fun will increase the token buyback ratio and use 100% of daily revenue for buyback": After closely monitoring the situation, it alerts the community to carefully observe on-chain data. Currently, Pump.fun only uses the recent 100% income for token buyback. Although in the past few days, Pump.fun bundled 100% of the income for token buyback, it was not fully implemented, raising doubts that they are misleading on-chain observers. Additionally, these tokens have never been burned or transferred anywhere, and there is currently no official announcement of a buyback system.

item.title: Bitcoin Falls Below $18,000, Ethereum Drops Below $3,800
item.description: On July 29th, according to HTX market data, Bitcoin fell below $118,000, experiencing a 24-hour loss of 0.46%. Ethereum also dropped below $3,800, with a 24-hour loss of 1.1%.

item.title: Galaxy Digital has received 21,035 ETH and deposited 5,000 of them into Coinbase, equivalent to approximately $19.28 million.
item.description: On July 29th, based on TheDataNerd's monitoring, one hour ago, Galaxy Digital received 21,035 ETH (approximately $81.08 million) and then deposited 5,000 ETH, which is about $19.28 million, into Coinbase.During the same time, Cumberland also deposited 10,592 ETH, approximately $40.79 million, into Coinbase.

item.title: Ethena Labs Introduces Liquid Leverage Feature on Aave
item.description: On July 29th, Ethena Labs made an announcement about the launch of Liquid Leverage on Aave. This enables users to deposit 50% sUSDe and 50% USDe. By doing so, they can obtain additional yield rewards (presently around 12% APY) along with the regular borrowing rate.
